extendedInfo.description: Get the most out of our Usborne Books & More National Convention in Tulsa, June 22-23 2012, with our new mobile app. This app has everything you need at your fingertips including: *A listing of Events you won't want to miss *Detailed schedules including speaker, room information and description *Get to know speakers before attending their workshops *Maps of the hotel, meeting rooms, and local area *Attendee list - to help you connect and network throughout the convention *Up to the minute updates from the Home Office *A place to take, store and share notes *A live Twitter feed to follow the convention buzz as well as direct access to Facebook Download this app today and get ready to CONNECT! at this year's National Convention.
